hero.title: Smarter Packaging Decisions That Drive Real Business Growth
hero.subtitle: Work with Dani Tulchinski to Unlock Powerful Packaging Strategies

services.intro: With 13+ years of industry experience, I help brands unlock growth through smarter packaging strategies, cutting-edge digital printing, and AI-powered solutions. Whether you're launching a new product or scaling globally, I’ll guide you to packaging decisions that drive results.

item1.title: Growth-Driven Strategy
item1.desc: At Sealed Air and HP Indigo, I led initiatives that generated $50M+ in revenue. I know how to align packaging with business goals — and turn innovation into profit.

item2.title: Comprehensive Expertise
item2.desc: From material science to e-commerce to sustainability — I offer full-spectrum guidance tailored to your product, audience, and market.

item3.title: Smarter Solutions, Faster
item3.desc: I harness Generative AI and digital tools to deliver packaging insights with speed and precision — so you make confident, data-backed decisions.

about.title: From Global Strategy to On-the-Ground Execution
about.p1: At Sealed Air and HP Indigo, I led cross-functional teams, built global partnerships, and helped pioneer technologies like Pack Ready and Digital Pouch Factory — unlocking new $1B+ markets and reshaping how brands approach packaging.
about.p2: With a background in chemistry, business, and AI-driven tools, I bridge the gap between R&D, marketing, and operations to deliver results that are not just innovative — but measurable, scalable, and sustainable.

numbers.title: Impact by the Numbers
numbers.intro: A snapshot of the results I’ve helped create — measurable, strategic, and driven by innovation across packaging, digital printing, and e-commerce.
numbers.item1: Business growth driven by digital packaging initiatives at Sealed Air and HP Indigo — turning new technologies into revenue and market share.
numbers.item2: Disruptive solutions developed and deployed, including Digital Pouch Factory, Pack Ready, and secure flexible packaging technologies.

item1.title: End-to-End Guidance
item1.desc: From ideation to market launch, I help you build packaging that stands out and scales.

item2.title: Data-Driven Decisions
item2.desc: Leverage my experience with AI and digital printing to make choices backed by real metrics.

item3.title: Global Industry Network
item3.desc: Tap into partnerships across the packaging value chain to accelerate innovation and growth.

cta.subtitle: Ready to transform your packaging?
cta.text: Contact me to discover how strategic packaging and digital innovation can grow your business.
